body: You did it first. The religious baker who wanted to be left alone, you just had to attack him and scream in his face and force him to bend to your demands. Maybe, just maybe, they wouldn't associate such negative attributes with gays if you didn't constantly shove it in their face. No, *you* pushed them over the edge, to scorning it and now to wanting to criminalize it. No one hated black people until you who falsely speak for them burned and looted Minneapolis for days straight. Thanks to *you*, now they really are racist, because you made them think this is what black people do. Maybe they wouldn't be so uncomfortable with trans people if it weren't for you fighting mostly for access to the womens' bathroom for people who still have a penis, athletes blatantly cheating by switching to the weaker team, and unbelievable college snowflakes freaking out about because someone dared "assume their gender". And then you pushed it even further, and now you've got them insisting that everyone follow defined gender roles and wanting to repeal the 19th. Maybe they would even be willing to get along you, but you said no, and there's definitely no going back now. Think about it, if a bunch of crazy people are constantly screaming about something relentlessly, you're going to start loathing said thing, even if you otherwise would've loved it. And those crazy people are what you are. Good job, you've managed to turn half the country against everything it once believed in to destroy you and everything you've made them associate with you. But hey, at least you can pull out your precious victim card, which was probably the plan all along!

Maybe they wouldn't be so uncomfortable with trans people if it weren't for you fighting mostly for access to the womens' bathroom for people who still have a penis, athletes blatantly cheating by switching to the weaker team, and unbelievable college snowflakes freaking out about because someone dared "assume their gender". And then you pushed it even further, and now you've got them insisting that everyone follow defined gender roles and wanting to repeal the 19th. Maybe they would even be willing to get along you, but you said no, and there's definitely no going back now. Think about it, if a bunch of crazy people are constantly screaming about something relentlessly, you're going to start loathing said thing, even if you otherwise would've loved it. body:
...ἐγένετο ῥῆμα Θεοῦ ἐπὶ Ἰωάννην...

...a statement of God became upon John...

Needless to say this is quite confusing. But it looks to be taken from the Hebrew gospel, which because it is such a common phrase and fits the context here perfectly, almost certainly said:

הָיְתָה רוּחַ אֱלֹהִים עַל־יֹוחָנָן

the **spirit** of God became upon John

Now that actually makes sense. And implies that John's following statements are prophetic and not merely his ramblings.
body_html:
...ἐγένετο ῥῆμα Θεοῦ ἐπὶ Ἰωάννην...

הָיְתָה רוּחַ אֱלֹהִים עַל־יֹוחָנָן

the spirit of God became upon John

Now that actually makes sense. And implies that John's following statements are prophetic and not merely his ramblings.

title: Luke 3:2 is a mistranslation

author.bio:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.
author.bio_html:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

body:
At some point scribes replaced the Isaiah quotation with the LXX version. Here is the Greek which seems to underlie all 3 of them:

> καὶ κηρύσσων ἐν τῇ ἐρήμῳ λέγων μετανοεῖτε ἤγγικεν γὰρ ἡ βασιλεία τῶν οὐρανῶν καθὼς γέγραπται ἐν βίβλῳ λόγων Ἡσαΐου τοῦ προφήτου φωνὴ βοῶντος ἐν τῇ ἐρήμῳ ἑτοιμάσατε τὴν ὁδὸν Κυρίου εὐθείας ποιεῖτε τὰς τρίβους αὐτοῦ

> And [John] was proclaiming in the desert...as it is written in the book of the words of Isaiah the prophet, "The voice of one crying in the desert..."

However based on the wording you can tell this was a translation from a semitic language, probably Hebrew as Aramaic doesn't fit quite as well here. If we go back to that we get:

> **וְיִקְרָא** בַּמִּדְבָּר לֵאמֹר שׁוּבוּ כִּי־קָרֹוב מַלְכוּת הַשָּׁמַיִם כַכָּת֣וּב בַּסֵּפֶר דִּבְרֵי יְשַׁעְיָהוּ הַנָּבִיא קֹ֣ול **קֹורֵ֔א** בַּמִּדְבָּ֕ר פַּנּ֖וּ דֶּ֣רֶךְ יְהוָ֑ה יַשְּׁרוּ֙ בָּעֲרָבָ֔ה מְסִלָּ֖ה לֵאלֹהֵֽינוּ

Which is slightly different:

> And [John] was **proclaiming** in the desert...as it is written in the book of the words of Isaiah the prophet, "The voice of one **proclaiming** in the desert..."

As you can see, the "correction" using the LXX introduces a different rendering of קרא, spoiling the parallel intended by the original author. This error has made its way into all 3 of the gospels which cover this story.
body_html:
At some point scribes replaced the Isaiah quotation with the LXX version. Here is the Greek which seems to underlie all 3 of them:

καὶ κηρύσσων ἐν τῇ ἐρήμῳ λέγων μετανοεῖτε ἤγγικεν γὰρ ἡ βασιλεία τῶν οὐρανῶν καθὼς γέγραπται ἐν βίβλῳ λόγων Ἡσαΐου τοῦ προφήτου φωνὴ βοῶντος ἐν τῇ ἐρήμῳ ἑτοιμάσατε τὴν ὁδὸν Κυρίου εὐθείας ποιεῖτε τὰς τρίβους αὐτοῦ

And [John] was proclaiming in the desert...as it is written in the book of the words of Isaiah the prophet, "The voice of one crying in the desert..."

However based on the wording you can tell this was a translation from a semitic language, probably Hebrew as Aramaic doesn't fit quite as well here. If we go back to that we get:

וְיִקְרָא בַּמִּדְבָּר לֵאמֹר שׁוּבוּ כִּי־קָרֹוב מַלְכוּת הַשָּׁמַיִם כַכָּת֣וּב בַּסֵּפֶר דִּבְרֵי יְשַׁעְיָהוּ הַנָּבִיא קֹ֣ול קֹורֵ֔א בַּמִּדְבָּ֕ר פַּנּ֖וּ דֶּ֣רֶךְ יְהוָ֑ה יַשְּׁרוּ֙ בָּעֲרָבָ֔ה מְסִלָּ֖ה לֵאלֹהֵֽינוּ

Which is slightly different:

And [John] was proclaiming in the desert...as it is written in the book of the words of Isaiah the prophet, "The voice of one proclaiming in the desert..."

As you can see, the "correction" using the LXX introduces a different rendering of קרא, spoiling the parallel intended by the original author. This error has made its way into all 3 of the gospels which cover this story.

body:
The reason they do is because women are sexually selective, and they know most men badly want pussy, so they will use this to manipulate them. Even good people will do this because no one ever taught them it's wrong. The other, probably even bigger reason is because of the Women Are Wonderful Effect. This is the phenomenon where both sexes instinctively care about females but not males. The reason for this is simple: you only need one male to impregnate thousands of females and have a lot of babies. But thousands of males and one female can still only produce one (or a few) babies.

Most people support this because humans have a fetish for it deeply ingrained into their DNA. But in reality it doesn't work out too well and results in simping and failed marriages motivated by sexual desire, and it's very annoying and unfair to people who are asexual or deviate from gender norms. If the exact same person were born the opposite sex, they'd get exponentially more or less sympathy and help from others simply because of that, not because of anything they did or didn't do to deserve it.

This is the phenomenon where both sexes instinctively care about females but not males. The reason for this is simple: you only need one male to impregnate thousands of females and have a lot of babies. But thousands of males and one female can still only produce one (or a few) babies.

Most people support this because humans have a fetish for it deeply ingrained into their DNA. But in reality it doesn't work out too well and results in simping and failed marriages motivated by sexual desire, and it's very annoying and unfair to people who are asexual or deviate from gender norms. If the exact same person were born the opposite sex, they'd get exponentially more or less sympathy and help from others simply because of that, not because of anything they did or didn't do to deserve it.

guild.description:
"For God so loved the world, that He gave His only begotten Son, that whoever believes in Him shall not perish, but have eternal life. For God did not send the Son into the world to judge the world, but that the world might be saved through Him. He who believes in Him is not judged; he who does not believe has been judged already, because he has not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God. This is the judgment, that the Light has come into the world, and men loved the darkness rather than the Light, for their deeds were evil. For everyone who does evil hates the Light, and does not come to the Light for fear that his deeds will be exposed. But he who practices the truth comes to the Light, so that his deeds may be manifested as having been wrought in God."

May all personally encounter the presence and attention of the Lord God. 

Curiosity, questions, discussion, and prayer requests are welcome.

guild.description:
Ask and answer questions.

Rules:

🤔 Posts must be questions. This is a community dedicated to Q&A discussion, so post titles must be in the form of a question.

body:
The three most common reasons I've heard people have kids are:

* To fulfill biological impulse

* To get help (basically slave labor; not as common in developed countries)

* To rise in social status

Given that the chances of the good outweighing the bad in any given person's life will be quite low, this is basically making another poor soul be born into this world just to get these little perks.

title: Women who are less than you are not attractive

author.bio:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.
author.bio_html:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

body:
Humans are a herd and tournament species, meaning their behavior is inherently violent, group-minded, hierarchical, collectivist, and conformist, and biological determinism plays a big role. Humans feel the best when they have established dominance or punished an enemy they've dehumanized. They need that feeling of "the enemy" to take down and obliterate, and a blind loyalty to their own clan and its leaders. This is why nearly every argument has two black-and-white sides with nearly zero middle-ground; 99% of people do not arrive at such conclusions by their own merit, but through loyalty to their tribe and hatred of "the enemy" one. And if any middle ground ever does exist, it is not recognized; both sides will merely attribute it to the other one. This is not how the real world works, this is how human instincts think it does. The excessive violence and authoritarianism of humans is explained by the ultimate desire to crush and obliterate whoever "the enemy" is, even when doing so is completely pointless. And unfortunately, the desire to identify an enemy to destroy is ever-present, meaning that even if there is no real conflict, humans will find an enemy in something silly or at worst, innocent, out of desperation to quench this instinct.

Within their tribes, humans love collectivism and defined social organization. Everyone follows pre-defined stereotypes and roles so it's easy to make all your judgements about someone by looking at them. Our bodies and brains develop in certain ways to fulfill these social roles. If someone falls out of line, it must be dealt with. If they do not oblige, they are disloyal and must be part of "the enemy". Individualism is tolerated to a degree but only when it's beneficial to the tribe. A good example is how women are afforded much greater freedom with their lives than men because they always have "I can bear children" to fall back on. Whether they intend to or not, or are even able to, humans make quick judgements based on what they see and will assume that she is fulfilling her social duty that way whether it's true or not. Men, however, must prove their loyalty and benefit to the tribe with actions and achievements, or they will immediately stand out as individuals among the brainwashed collective.

Anyone on the outside looking in would be horrified. Even the freest possible human community is very close to communism in absolute terms. Humans on a fundamental level are no different than horses or wolves or other herd animals who are defined by their membership in a collective and aren't allowed to have any life or mind of their own. It's just that these herds manifest in a much larger and more powerful scale in humans.

Humans feel the best when they have established dominance or punished an enemy they've dehumanized. This is why nearly every argument has two black-and-white sides with nearly zero middle-ground; 99% of people do not arrive at such conclusions by their own merit, but through loyalty to their tribe and hatred of "the enemy" one. And if any middle ground ever does exist, it is not recognized; both sides will merely attribute it to the other one. This is not how the real world works, this is how human instincts think it does. The excessive violence and authoritarianism of humans is explained by the ultimate desire to crush and obliterate whoever "the enemy" is, even when doing so is completely pointless. And unfortunately, the desire to identify an enemy to destroy is ever-present, meaning that even if there is no real conflict, humans will find an enemy in something silly or at worst, innocent, out of desperation to quench this instinct.

Within their tribes, humans love collectivism and defined social organization. Everyone follows pre-defined stereotypes and roles so it's easy to make all your judgements about someone by looking at them. Our bodies and brains develop in certain ways to fulfill these social roles. If someone falls out of line, it must be dealt with. If they do not oblige, they are disloyal and must be part of "the enemy". Individualism is tolerated to a degree but only when it's beneficial to the tribe. A good example is how women are afforded much greater freedom with their lives than men because they always have "I can bear children" to fall back on. Whether they intend to or not, or are even able to, humans make quick judgements based on what they see and will assume that she is fulfilling her social duty that way whether it's true or not. Men, however, must prove their loyalty and benefit to the tribe with actions and achievements, or they will immediately stand out as individuals among the brainwashed collective.

Anyone on the outside looking in would be horrified. Even the freest possible human community is very close to communism in absolute terms. Humans on a fundamental level are no different than horses or wolves or other herd animals who are defined by their membership in a collective and aren't allowed to have any life or mind of their own. It's just that these herds manifest in a much larger and more powerful scale in humans.

body:
All the time I've been alive everyone loved Adam Sandler because he's funny, and his movies were very popular.

The past couple weeks I've suddenly encountered a bunch of jokes about how bad Adam Sandler is. And how much his movies suck. It's prevalent enough that most don't seem to be woooshed by it, and apparently he's despised enough that his movies are worthy of being feared similar to Justin Bieber. I was surprised but sure enough even classics he starred in have terrible reviews now.

Does anyone know what prompted this? And does this mean people now hate other comedy actors like Chris Farley and David Spade too, or just Adam Sandler for some reason?
body_html:
All the time I've been alive everyone loved Adam Sandler because he's funny, and his movies were very popular.

The past couple weeks I've suddenly encountered a bunch of jokes about how bad Adam Sandler is. And how much his movies suck. It's prevalent enough that most don't seem to be woooshed by it, and apparently he's despised enough that his movies are worthy of being feared similar to Justin Bieber. I was surprised but sure enough even classics he starred in have terrible reviews now.

Does anyone know what prompted this? And does this mean people now hate other comedy actors like Chris Farley and David Spade too, or just Adam Sandler for some reason?

body: For example, if there's images or something loading in the background, you can't vote or comment at all, you have to wait until it's finished. It seems the JS to process these events loads last, which I definitely think should be changed.
